law.catch_line: Clerk's failure to place candidate's name on ballot.
law.text: Any county clerk who willfully and knowingly refuses or fails to have the name of any candidate printed upon the official ballot in the manner provided by law shall be guilty of a Class D felony.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 70, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 69.
